headline: This Is the One Investing Rule Warren Buffett Won't Break -- and It Fully Explains His $174 Billion Warning to Wall Street
summary: While some of the Oracle of Omaha's investing rules have proved fungible during his six decades as Berkshire Hathaway CEO, one of his key investment traits is unbendable.
